channel.title: Mastodon Home Timeline
channel.description: RSS feed for the Mastodon Home timeline

item.title: Dan Gillmor
item.description: It's sad but predictable to see Big Journalism fall for the latest Trump world con -- pretending that the "resignation" of the Project 2025 head and "end of policy work" (it's already completed) has any meaning whatsoever beyond performance.Trump plans a dictatorship with all kinds of grotesque policies. That hasn't changed at all.Come on, political journalists, do your effing jobs for once.

item.title: d a t green
item.description: I am still on Twitter, just about, as I have a large following for my posts and stuff. But it is something I think about ending everyday, as now even having a nominal 230k followers has very little click-through.Not really taken to Threads or BlueSky.And so it is here and Substack, for me.And for those of you who don't like Substack, I crosspost on my own blog. (I keep Substack under review too.)

item.title: Sherifa Zuhur
item.description: Dr. Hanan Ashrawi: Gangster style assassinations & extra judicial executions are a matter of policy in Israel. The bombing of Fuad Shukri in Beirut followed by the murder of Ismail Haniyyeh in Tehran are specifically designed to inflame the whole region & sabotage any chances of a deal or deescalation. These are attacks not just on the capitals of sovereign states but also on significant leaders to ensure total provocation & destabilisation. Israel is a rogue state that represents a real & present danger globally.https://x.com/drhananashrawi/status/1818531108323037372?s=12&t=uM8me4uwdP7D0z4nanVVuw

item.title: MiniMia üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å∑Û†Å¨Û†Å≥Û†Åø üáµüá∏
item.description:
More than 200 community members in Southport responded to the invasion of fascist thugs in their streets last night by coming together to clear St Luke's Road and rebuild the wall outside the mosque üíñ
Local tradesmen offered their time for free. Residents brought water, crates of free coffee and tools.
"We‚Äôre fixing the damage that these scumbags did.‚Äù
Photos of the vigil and this morning's clean up via On The Spot News.#UKPolitics #FuckTheFash #SolidarityIsBeautiful

item.title: Carl Zimmer
item.description: I wrote about physicist Sara Walker's travels in the border zones of life in my 2021 book "Life's Edge." Now she has written a book of her own. Here's my story on "Life As No One Knows It." Gift link: https://nyti.ms/4fueKlU

item.description: I‚Äôll bet Trump isn‚Äôt confused about whether he is Scottish or German.

item.title: Mastodon Migration
item.description: No corporate media, you don't get to normalize appalling overt racism as a campaign strategy.This morning the NY Times and Washington Post continue analysis of Trump's racist remarks in the context of 'the challenge they pose to Harris.'It's like opining that a wife beater makes domestic bliss complicated.Carol Cadwalladr told us it was coming. Racism and misogyny at an unprecedented scale, fueled by corporate media, and it is here.https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/article/2024/jul/27/misogyny-emergency-huge-outpouring-kamala-harris-us-electionction@kamalaharrisforpresidentnews

item.title: Qasim Rashid, Esq.
item.description: Nimarata Nikki Randhawa ran as Nikki Haley Piyush Jindal ran as Bobby JindalRaphael Cruz ran as Ted CruzMeanwhile‚ÄîBarack Obama ran as Barack Obama & Kamala Harris is running as Kamala Harris & MAGAs accuse Dems of identity politicsEvery MAGA accusation is a confession

item.title: Carl Zimmer
item.description: How did the rose get its thorns? For starters, they're prickles, not thorns. And it turns out that roses and lots of other plants have harnessed the same gene to grow them. Here's my evo-devo story https://nyti.ms/3yjFPr7

item.title: Dave Troy :toad:
item.description:
üìª NEW EPISODE: "Popping the AI Bubble with Gary Marcus" AI tops tech headlines, but there are reasons to think the current bubble is losing momentum. Dave is joined by AI expert @garymarcus for a wide-ranging discussion about the reality vs. hype of AI.
https://pod.co/dave-troy/popping-the-ai-bubble-with-gary-marcus

item.title: Jos√© A. Alonso
item.description: AlphaProof, AlphaGeometry, ChatGPT, and why the future of AI is neurosymbolic. ~ Gary Marcus (@garymarcus). https://garymarcus.substack.com/p/alphaproof-alphageometry-chatgpt #AI

item.title: Dan Gillmor
item.description: A reminder that it's all corruption, all the time in Trump world. https://www.propublica.org/article/trump-media-truth-social-jedtec-james-davison-conflict-of-interestBig Journalism treats the serial scandals as one-offs.And, even now, journalists -- including the otherwise brilliant @ProPublica -- can't be bothered to pull it all together to show the breadth and depth of the sleaze. They notice some of the fires breaking out. But they never explain that the entire forest is ablaze.

item.title: Carl Zimmer
item.description: I'm very excited to share my next book: AIR-BORNE: THE HIDDEN HISTORY OF THE LIFE WE BREATHE. Check out my new email newsletter to find out all about it! https://buttondown.email/carlzimmer/archive/fridays-elk-introducing-air-borne-my-next-book/

item.title: Till Kamppeter
item.description: I got note of this new paperweight by a thread on the #OpenPrinting developer mailing list:https://lore.kernel.org/printing-architecture/ZqzQk8FdOfjIRwtl@shaftnet.org/T/#tConclusion in the thread:Print engine and network module are two separate parts in a typical printer. When printer (USB-only) does not have latter, no driverless IPP, even not IPP-over-USB.So always get a network/Wi-Fi printer even if you want to use it via USB.
